articles.author: Amala Balakrishner
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets fall as tariff worries dent investor sentiment - CNBC
articles.description: Consumer inflation in China rose to a five-month high on the back of higher spending in the lead up to the Lunar New Year.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets fell Monday, tracking U.S. stocks futures that were lower ahead of key economic data, with escalating trade tensions denting investor sentiment.
U.S. President Donald Trump told… [+2379 chars]
